action.description: The committee on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Evslin, Miyake, Grandinetti, Muraoka, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Kila, Kitagawa, La Chica.
